name: Quest n Craft
description:
is is just a game im working on in my extra time as something fund to do it is a crafting , quest and mining game . im looking for som honest feed back one my take on the  system and would love any feedback. that said the game is nowere near com pleand as i only get to work on a few hours a week and making a game is time. i am also trying out a levling  skill system. be warnd thouhg monsers skills lvl too 
 ps. it would be hard to lvl on monster alone
